title: IISER Thiruvananthapuram Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Apprentice Trainee Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Science Education and Research, Thiruvananthapuram (IISER Thiruvananthapuram) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Graduate Apprentice, Diploma Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc., Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, and Civil Engineering can apply for the IISER Thiruvananthapuram Jobs 2025 . T...
